description: Describes the connection notifications for VPC endpoints and VPC endpoint services.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Describing VPC endpoint connection notifications can help identify shared resources within the VPC, providing information on the network structure and potential entry points.
By describing VPC endpoint connection notifications, an attacker can gather information about the network connections and endpoints configured in the VPC.
Describing VPC endpoint connection notifications can reveal details about network services in use, which can be leveraged for further network service scanning.

incidents.description: Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeVpcEndpointConnectionNotifications to monitor notification configurations for VPC endpoints.
